Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell smased 120 off just 55 balls
Australia posted 241/4 after being put into bat
Post-Match Reflections: Mitchell Marsh, the victorious skipper of Australia, talks about this being a good game of cricket and credits Glenn Maxwell for his performance
Rovman Powell, the captain of West Indies, says that the boys showed good courage but lost wickets at regular intervals and failed to stick to their plans
Glenn Maxwell is the PLAYER OF THE MATCH for his stunning century
Spencer Johnson credits Glenn Maxwell for his amazing knock and says that he told everyone before the game that he would get a hundred
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glenn Maxwell says that at the start he was struggling a bit but then he timed a few well and got back into the game after that
Rovman Powell mentions that it is very difficult to bowl to Glenn Maxwell as he has great skills
Nicholas Pooran is an exceptional batter according to Spencer Johnson
The 3rd and final T20I will be played on 13th February, Tuesday at 1.30 pm (8 am GMT)
Others: Josh Hazlewood and Spencer Johnson gave Australia the perfect start with a couple of early wickets
Alzarri Joseph and Romario Shepherd chipped in with one each for West Indies
Dre Russ smashed 37 off just 16 balls to keep West Indies in the chase
Jason Holder backs away but fails to dig it out and gets hit on the pads
Jason Holder smashes the ball to long off and runs a single
